item.description:
Hey guys!! This coming weekend will be PERFECT to enjoy the last days of summer, hang out on the beach, ride jetski, play ball, grab a drink and get some tan.

At 12 noon we'll be meeting up in Old Lyme at Sound View beach, we'll gather at the flagpole at the center entrance off the main road. We'll be basking in the sun, playing in the water, and talking away till 3 - 4pm. At that time on the beach there is a bar called Pavilion. They usually have a live band and we'll head inside to mingle and dance.

Bring your friends, bring your beach toys, bring your boat, bring your jetski - free mooring by Pavilion/Sound View and a few places to launch nearby.

RSVP so we don't miss you when gathering up at the beach.

Any questions, or just wonna chat - call me (305) 423-9524,

See you on there!!111!

@@@@@@
Andrew
item.name: Labor day weekend Fun in the Sun
